description: This version of the  Man in Tuxedo emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on suppo
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man in a tuxedo emoji with medium-light skin tone exudes sophisticated elegance, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The crisp black tuxedo features subtle folds and realistic lighting, highlighting its polished texture, while the white shirt and bow tie are brilliantly illuminated. This emoji, with its confident posture, is ideal for occasions calling for formal attire, celebrations, or expressing a sense of dapper refinement in messages sent on Apple devices.
